overview:
Felipe Mendoza is the CEO and Director of Vidneur.

Felipe allways thought in create an Internet Startup and now he is the Cofunder with Mauricio Vanegas.

Vidneur.com is an Online plataform who offers Business, Economy & Startups information to Global Entrepreneurs since Hong Kong (H.K) till Los Angeles (L.A)

Felipe borned in Medellín, CO. “The next Silicon Valley” as he said in this interview.

Find out more: http://www.vidneur.com
